summary:
The year in twelve selfies: with Eduardo in Quito, Ecuador (January); with Atlantis, Kennedy Space Center (February); hiking in Tucson, Arizona (March); with Marlene after the Ohio State Four Miler (April); along the Fairport Harbor West Breakwater (May); with Steve Steinour (June); with the Family at Mount Rainier (July); with Marlene, Eli, and Crew Cat before a Columbus Crew game (August); during the Cleveland Clinic Brain Study (September); with Marlene in Chesapeake City, Maryland (October); with Marlene, Kristen, and Alan in Albuquerque, New Mexico (November); with Raghu, Tim, and Bobby in Las Vegas, Nevada (December)

The most notable event of the year was my father‚Äôs sudden and unexpected death in May.  I am fortunate, though; We were always in constant contact, even if we weren‚Äôt exactly close.  I helped him last year to become active again in amateur radio and he seemed to be getting a lot of enjoyment from it during his final months...
